_header: An moorlands man of uplands make
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Tydingis fra the sessioun’ — eight seven-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Ane Murelandis man of vplandis mak At hame thus to his nighbour
                    spak…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…All mercifull women þair eirand grantisSic tythingis
                    hard I at þe sessioun

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Ane murelandis man of vplandis makAt hame þus to his nychbour
                    Spak…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…All mercyfull women þair errand grantisSic tythingis
                    hard I at þe Sessioun

Banna.First Lines:
Ane mvrlandis man of vplandis makAt hame thus to his nychtbour
                    spak…
Banna.Last Lines:
…All mercyfull wemen thair eirandis grantisSic tydingis hard I
                    at the sessioun
Banna.Attributed Title:
ffollowis certane ballattis aganie the vyce in sessioun court and all
                    estaitis (f. 59)
